name: 20 Pixels Shooter Game Jam20
description:
I wasn't going to enter the game jam, but one of the examples they gave, a game that is 20x20 pixels caught my attention. That seemed like a cool challenge. I started very late. I only had two days to get this done. Whew!

Controls: A, S W, D for movement. Left, Right, Up arrows for shooting. 

Controller: Left stick moves. Three face buttons shoot. Start restarts game.
